bug.summary: kfctl generate istio VirtualService with --use_istio false
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: [A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] The bug is that the kustomize generated configs contains service yaml for istio VirtualService when --use_istio false is used What did you expect to happen: No istio related configs generated Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] With --use_istio false, there won't be istio CRDs and it will fail the deployment as some of the VirtualService is not recognised. See the errors below. <denchmark-code>no matches for kind "VirtualService" in version "networking.istio.io/v1alpha3" </denchmark-code>

Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): kfctl version: (use kfctl version): v0.6.2 Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) (On-prem) GCP cluster Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): 1.15 OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
